    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2

    Facet Text_Paragraph_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2:Text_Paragraph_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Text_Paragraph language="en" name="paragraph name" number="1234" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2">
    <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
    <Text language="en" textFormat="HTML">Formatted text example.</Text>
    <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
    <Image>Example String Value</Image>
    <Image>Example String Value</Image>
    <Image>Example String Value</Image>
    <URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</URL>
    <URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</URL>
    <URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</URL>
    <Paragraph_ListItem formattedText="Formatted text example." language="en" listItem="1234" textFormat="HTML"/>
    <Paragraph_ListItem formattedText="Formatted text example." language="en" listItem="2345" textFormat="PlainText"/>
    <Paragraph_ListItem formattedText="Formatted text example." language="en" listItem="3456" textFormat="HTML"/>
    <DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00</DateTimeStamp>
</Text_Paragraph>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Text_Paragraph" : {
    "@type" : "Text_Paragraph",
    "name" : "paragraph name",
    "number" : 1234,
    "language" : "en",
    "Text" : [ {
      "value" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "PlainText"
    }, {
      "value" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "HTML"
    }, {
      "value" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "PlainText"
    } ],
    "Image" : [ "Example String Value", "Example String Value", "Example String Value" ],
    "URL" : [ "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema", "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ],
    "Paragraph_ListItem" : [ {
      "value" : null,
      "listItem" : 1234,
      "formattedText" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "HTML"
    }, {
      "value" : null,
      "listItem" : 2345,
      "formattedText" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "PlainText"
    }, {
      "value" : null,
      "listItem" : 3456,
      "formattedText" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "HTML"
    } ],
    "DateTimeStamp" : {
      "value" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00",
      "create" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00",
      "creatorID" : "c123456789",
      "lastModify" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00",
      "lastModifierID" : "m987654321",
      "purge" : "2011-01-24"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Text
        Text content.
        Details
        Type Text
        Example Value Formatted text example.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1000
        Image
        An image for this paragraph.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1000
        URL
        A URL for this paragraph.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:anyURI
        Example Value http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1000
        Paragraph_ListItem
        Formatted text content and an associated item or sequence number.
        Details
        Type Paragraph_ListItem
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1000
        DateTimeStamp
        Creation date time, Creator ID, last modification date time and last modifier ID for the paragraph.
        Details
        Type Date_TimeStamp
        Example Value 2011-01-24T09:45:00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        name
        This will allow you to define the information that is being sent, typically used when multiple occurrences of ParagraphType are being sent.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Tiny
        Example Value paragraph name
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        number
        The sequence number for the paragraph.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        language
        The language for this paragraph.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:language
        Example Value en
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Alias Summary

        Aliases 
        Comment_Summary, Description_Summary
